channel.title: What company is more advanced?
channel.description:
post the companies you think are the most advanced, heres mine (it doesn't matter how many companies you post)
1) apple 2)microsoft (kind of) 1)pepperidge farm cookies

item.title: What company is more advanced?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

Intel by far. Just look what they’ve been up to.

I wouldn’t say by far. Yea, they stuffed 80 cores into something smaller than a fingernail. Advancement isn’t as tangible as that.

item.title: What company is more advanced?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:7, topic:121836”]Ok, define OSX.
It’s non existent.
So, I’m saying this nicely, STFU.[/quote]

I love how these cocky noobs can just come on here and talk shit about what they don’t know.

en.wikipedia.org

macOS

macOS (/ˌmækʔoʊˈɛs/; previously Mac OS X and later OS X, Roman numeral "X" pronounced "ten") is a series of graphical operating systems developed and marketed by Apple Inc. since 2001. It is the primary operating system for Apple's Mac family of computers. Within the market of desktop, laptop and home computers, and by web usage, it is the second most widely used desktop OS, after Microsoft Windows. macOS is the second major series of Macintosh operating systems. The first is colloquially ca...

kthxbye.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is more advanced?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

In no particular order…

BASF
DuPont
Dow Chemical Company
Boeing
HP
Rothschild
United Technologies Corporation
IBM
Goldman-Sachs
Toshiba

Dunno…probably missed the most advanced one. And even if I could figure out the “Most advanced” I think if any corporation developed a true breakthrough in the field of technology they wouldn’t broadcast it to the world they would figure out a way to make lots of money off of it first.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is more advanced?
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:6, topic:121836”][quote author=I Am Olan14 link=topic=171434.msg1585459#msg1585459 date=1184132061]
Can’t OSX is copyrighted my Apple [You spelled OS at the end with OSX so I decided to fuck with you]
[/quote]

I know what I’m saying. Make me an OSX. It’s one thing to make an OS; it’s another to make an OSX. No one follows copyright law anyway.[/quote]
Ok, define OSX.
It’s non existent.
So, I’m saying this nicely, STFU.

Read full topic

item.title: What company is more advanced?
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:2, topic:121836”][quote author=tryed to hack it link=topic=171434.msg1585269#msg1585269 date=1184126892]
post the companies you think are the most advanced, heres mine (it doesn’t matter how many companies you post)

  1. apple
    2)microsoft (kind of)
    1)pepperidge farm cookies
    [/quote]

Why do you have two 1’s? And how is the cookie-making business anywhere close to the OS, hardware, music, or cell phone industries? My 10 year old brother can make a cookie. I’d like to see you make me an OSX.[/quote]
Can’t OSX is copyrighted my Apple [You spelled OS at the end with OSX so I decided to fuck with you]
